revised_title: Robert George Spencer Hudson: A Pioneering Geologist and Palaeontologist
tldr: Robert George Spencer Hudson was a distinguished geologist and palaeontologist known for his major studies in Carboniferous palaeontology, stratigraphy, and sedimentation in Yorkshire, England, and his contributions to the understanding of the geology and palaeontology of the Middle East. He worked for the Iraq Petroleum Company and made significant discoveries of Mesozoic Stromatoporoids in the region. Hudson also held various positions at universities and was involved in the local geological societies.
